summary.span: 指定視覺化樣式套用至目前應用程式的方式。

span.span: Specifies how visual styles are applied to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別由屬性來指定是否將視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的用戶端或非工作區。This enumeration is used by the property to specify whether visual styles are applied to client or nonclient areas of application windows. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是一個簡單的程式，適用於每個所指定的四個區域中的視覺化樣式值。The following code example is a simple program that applies visual styles in each of the four areas specified by the values. 若要啟用視覺化樣式的某些區域中，按一下選項按鈕 （也稱為選項按鈕），表示您想要啟用，然後按一下的區域**更新 VisualStyleState**按鈕，以在視窗中所作的變更。To enable visual styles in a certain area, click the option button (also known as a radio button) that represents the area you want to enable, and click the **Update VisualStyleState** button to observe the changes in the window.
